pkgmetadata.longdescription: Implements the MDLP discretization criterion from Usama Fayyad's paper"Multi-Interval Discretization of Continuous-Valued Attributes forClassification Learning."Home-page: github.com/hlin117/mdlp-discretizationAuthor: Henry LinAuthor-email: hlin117@gmail.comLicense: BSD 3 ClauseDescription: UNKNOWNPlatform: UNKNOWN
